title: Visualization Paradigm Selection
description: An interactive decision tree helping learners identify which visualization paradigm (Timeline, Map, Network Graph, Chart, or Flowchart) best fits their content type based on data characteristics.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Data Visualization
Instructional Design
Information Design
learningObjectives: Match content characteristics to appropriate visualization types
Explain when to use Timeline, Map, Network Graph, Chart, or Flowchart
Apply visualization selection criteria to real-world scenarios

controls.description: Hover over visualization options to preview selection
Click on visualization type to see detailed information and examples

assumptions: User has content to visualize and needs guidance on paradigm selection
limitations: Does not cover specialized visualization types like treemaps, heatmaps, or 3D visualizations
